content.text: Good, just got back from the park with my daughter. She's getting to be a big girl now!
That's awesome! I miss my nieces and nephews. How old is she?
She's 2.5 years old. She's learning to talk and walk now, it's so cute.
That's amazing! I love listening to kids talk. It's so innocent.
Me too. It's the best. I love listening to her tell me stories about her day.
What kind of stories does she tell you?
Usually about her friends at the park or the things she's learned from her books.
That's so sweet. I bet she's a great story teller.
She is! She's got me laughing all the time.
You're lucky! I miss having kids around.
You should have some! They're the best.
Maybe someday. I'm just not ready yet.
That's fair. You have to be ready.
Yeah. I'm not sure when I'll be ready, but I'm sure it'll happen eventually.
